casebody.data:
WAKE CARES, INC., et al.
v.
BOE, et al. No. 230PA08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 26, 2008. Robert N. Hunter, Jr., Greensboro, for Wake Care, Inc., et al. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd day of June 2008 by Defendants to Deny Petition for Writ of Supersedeas: "Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference this the 26th day of August 2008." MARTIN, J., recused.
